department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology
department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程

goal.en: In response to the 2021-2030 United Nations Decade of Ocean Science for Sustainable Development, the purpose of this course is to enable students to understand the Earth system and climate past and future, which related to the ocean-atmospheric interaction. This course hopes to enable students to understand the earth environment in which we live. (This course welcomes undergraduate students to join) 111/2 Evaluation score: 5/5
goal.ch: 為因應2021-2030為聯合國海洋永續發展十年挑戰，本課程目的為讓學生了解從古至今的地球系統和氣候，以了解過去至未來的氣候變遷，為一橫跨大氣與海洋的氣候科學，希望能讓學生了解我們居住的地球環境。 (本課程歡迎大學部同學選修) 111/2教學評量結果: 5/5

content.en:
Week 1 (2024/02/19) Curriculum＆ Instruction
Week 2 (2024/02/26) Overview of Climate Change Science
Week 3 (2024/03/04) Overview of Physical Oceanography
Week 4 (2024/03/11) Ocean and Climate Variability
Week 5 (2024/03/18) Waves and Tides
Week 6 (2024/03/25) Introduction to Ocean Dynamics processes
Week 7 (2024/04/01) Wind Forcing, Geostrophic Balance, Vorticity
Week 8 (2024/04/08) Mid-term week (No class)
Week 9 (2024/04/15) Mid-term Paper Reading Presentation
Week 10 (2024/04/22) Wind-driven Circulation
Week 11 (2024/04/29) Ocean-Typhoon Interaction I
Week 12 (2024/05/06) Ocean-Typhoon Interaction II
Week 13 (2024/05/13) Arctic Ocean and Nordic Seas
Week 14 (2024/05/20) Southern Ocean
Week 15 (2024/05/27) Japan Geoscience Union Meeting 2024 (No class)
Week 16 (2024/06/03) Final Oral Presentation
